service.method:
SELECT A.HD_GB_TEXT , A.HD_GB , A.ANN_NO , A.VOTE_COUNT , A.ANN_ITEM , A.SETTLE_AMT , A.ATTACH_NO , A.SUBMIT_DATE_TIME , A.CONFIRM_FLAG_TEXT , A.CONFIRM_FLAG , A.NFIT_RSN , A.ATTACH_CNT , A.ATTACH_NO_H , A.BID_NO , A.BID_COUNT , A.ANN_VERSION , A.BID_TYPE , A.STATUS , A.VENDOR_CODE FROM ( SELECT (SELECT TEXT1 FROM SCODE WHERE TYPE = 'M700_ICT' AND CODE = 'B') AS HD_GB_TEXT , 'B' AS HD_GB , HD.ANN_NO AS ANN_NO , NVL((SELECT Z.VOTE_COUNT FROM ICOYBDPG_ICT Z WHERE Z.HOUSE_CODE = HD.HOUSE_CODE AND Z.BID_NO = HD.BID_NO AND Z.BID_COUNT = HD.BID_COUNT AND Z.STATUS IN ('C', 'R') ),'') AS VOTE_COUNT , HD.ANN_ITEM , NVL((SELECT Z.BID_AMT FROM ICOYBDVO_ICT Z WHERE Z.HOUSE_CODE = HD.HOUSE_CODE AND Z.BID_NO = HD.BID_NO AND Z.BID_COUNT = HD.BID_COUNT AND Z.STATUS IN ('C', 'R') AND Z.BID_CANCEL = 'N' AND Z.BID_STATUS = 'SB' ),'') AS SETTLE_AMT ,CT2.ATTACH_NO AS ATTACH_NO ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CT2.SUBMIT_DATE||CT2.SUBMIT_TIME, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'),'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') AS SUBMIT_DATE_TIME ,(SELECT TEXT1 FROM SCODE WHERE TYPE = 'M980_ICT' AND CODE = CT2.CONFIRM_FLAG) CONFIRM_FLAG_TEXT ,CT2.CONFIRM_FLAG ,CT2.NFIT_RSN ,GETFILEATTCOUNT(CT2.ATTACH_NO) ATTACH_CNT ,CT2.ATTACH_NO AS ATTACH_NO_H ,HD.BID_NO ,HD.BID_COUNT , CASE WHEN HD.ANN_VERSION IS NULL THEN (SELECT CODE FROM SCODE WHERE TYPE = 'VR001_ICT') ELSE HD.ANN_VERSION END AS ANN_VERSION , HD.BID_TYPE , HD.BID_STATUS AS STATUS , (SELECT Z.VENDOR_CODE FROM ICOYBDVO_ICT Z WHERE Z.HOUSE_CODE = PG.HOUSE_CODE AND Z.BID_NO = PG.BID_NO AND Z.BID_COUNT = PG.BID_COUNT AND Z.VOTE_COUNT = PG.VOTE_COUNT AND Z.BID_CANCEL = 'N' AND Z.BID_STATUS = 'SB' AND Z.STATUS IN ('C', 'R') ) AS VENDOR_CODE , PG.OPEN_DATE||PG.OPEN_TIME AS BID_OPEN_DATE_VALUE FROM ICOYBDHD_ICT HD , ICOYBDPG_ICT PG , ICOYBDVO_ICT VO , ICOYBDCT2_ICT CT2 WHERE PG.HOUSE_CODE = HD.HOUSE_CODE AND HD.HOUSE_CODE = ${HOUSE_CODE} AND PG.BID_NO = HD.BID_NO AND PG.BID_COUNT = HD.BID_COUNT AND PG.HOUSE_CODE = VO.HOUSE_CODE AND PG.BID_NO = VO.BID_NO AND PG.BID_COUNT = VO.BID_COUNT AND PG.VOTE_COUNT = VO.VOTE_COUNT
AND HD.HOUSE_CODE = CT2.HOUSE_CODE(+) AND HD.BID_NO = CT2.BID_NO(+) AND HD.BID_COUNT = CT2.BID_COUNT(+)
AND HD.ES_FLAG = 'E' AND (PG.BID_END_DATE BETWEEN ${START_CHANGE_DATE} AND ${END_CHANGE_DATE} OR PG.BID_END_DATE IS NULL )
AND (HD.ANN_NO LIKE '%'|| $S{ann_no} ||'%' or HD.BID_NO LIKE '%'|| $S{ann_no} ||'%')
AND HD.ANN_ITEM LIKE '%'|| $S{ann_item} ||'%' AND VO.VENDOR_CODE = ${COMPANY_CODE} AND VO.BID_STATUS = 'SB' AND HD.BID_STATUS = 'SB' AND NVL(PREFERRED_BIDDER, 'N') != 'Y' AND HD.CHANGE_USER_ID = $S{contact_user}
AND (PG.HOUSE_CODE,PG.BID_NO,PG.BID_COUNT) IN (SELECT DISTINCT PG.HOUSE_CODE,PG.BID_NO,PG.BID_COUNT FROM ICOYBDHD_ICT HD , ICOYBDPG_ICT PG , ICOYBDVO_ICT VO WHERE PG.HOUSE_CODE = HD.HOUSE_CODE AND HD.HOUSE_CODE = '000' AND PG.BID_NO = HD.BID_NO AND PG.BID_COUNT = HD.BID_COUNT AND PG.HOUSE_CODE = VO.HOUSE_CODE AND PG.BID_NO = VO.BID_NO AND PG.BID_COUNT = VO.BID_COUNT AND PG.VOTE_COUNT = VO.VOTE_COUNT AND HD.ES_FLAG = 'E' AND HD.BID_STATUS IN ('SB', 'NB', 'RR') AND HD.SIGN_STATUS IN ('C') AND HD.STATUS IN ('C' ,'R') AND PG.STATUS IN ('C' ,'R','D') )
AND (PG.HOUSE_CODE,PG.BID_NO,PG.BID_COUNT,PG.VOTE_COUNT) IN (SELECT PG.HOUSE_CODE,PG.BID_NO,PG.BID_COUNT,MAX(PG.VOTE_COUNT) VOTE_COUNT FROM ICOYBDHD_ICT HD , ICOYBDPG_ICT PG , ICOYBDVO_ICT VO WHERE PG.HOUSE_CODE = HD.HOUSE_CODE AND HD.HOUSE_CODE = '000' AND PG.BID_NO = HD.BID_NO AND PG.BID_COUNT = HD.BID_COUNT AND PG.HOUSE_CODE = VO.HOUSE_CODE AND PG.BID_NO = VO.BID_NO AND PG.BID_COUNT = VO.BID_COUNT AND PG.VOTE_COUNT = VO.VOTE_COUNT AND HD.ES_FLAG = 'E' AND HD.BID_STATUS IN ('SB', 'NB', 'RR') AND HD.SIGN_STATUS IN ('C') AND HD.STATUS IN ('C' ,'R') AND PG.STATUS IN ('C' ,'R','D') AND VO.VENDOR_CODE = ${COMPANY_CODE} GROUP BY PG.HOUSE_CODE,PG.BID_NO,PG.BID_COUNT )
UNION ALL
SELECT (SELECT TEXT1 FROM SCODE WHERE TYPE = 'M700_ICT' AND CODE = HNDG.HD_GB) AS HD_GB_TEXT , HNDG.HD_GB , HNDG.ANN_NO , NULL AS VOTE_COUNT , HNDG.ANN_ITEM , HNDG.SETTLE_AMT , CT2.ATTACH_NO AS ATTACH_NO ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CT2.SUBMIT_DATE||CT2.SUBMIT_TIME, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'),'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') AS SUBMIT_DATE_TIME ,(SELECT TEXT1 FROM SCODE WHERE TYPE = 'M980_ICT' AND CODE = CT2.CONFIRM_FLAG) CONFIRM_FLAG_TEXT ,CT2.CONFIRM_FLAG ,CT2.NFIT_RSN ,GETFILEATTCOUNT(CT2.ATTACH_NO) ATTACH_CNT ,CT2.ATTACH_NO AS ATTACH_NO_H ,HNDG.BID_NO ,HNDG.BID_COUNT ,'' AS ANN_VERSION ,'' AS BID_TYPE ,'' AS STATUS ,HNDG.VENDOR_CODE ,HNDG.ADD_DATE||HNDG.ADD_TIME AS BID_OPEN_DATE_VALUE FROM ICOYHNDG_ICT HNDG , ICOYBDCT2_ICT CT2 WHERE HNDG.HOUSE_CODE = CT2.HOUSE_CODE(+) AND HNDG.BID_NO = CT2.BID_NO(+) AND HNDG.BID_COUNT = CT2.BID_COUNT(+) AND HNDG.STATUS IN ('C' ,'R')
AND HNDG.ADD_DATE BETWEEN ${START_CHANGE_DATE} AND ${END_CHANGE_DATE} AND HNDG.ANN_NO LIKE '%'|| $S{ann_no} ||'%' AND HNDG.ANN_ITEM LIKE '%'|| $S{ann_item} ||'%' AND HNDG.VENDOR_CODE = ${COMPANY_CODE} ) A ORDER BY A.BID_OPEN_DATE_VALUE DESC

SELECT HD.CHANGE_USER_NAME_LOC ,HD.ANN_NO ,HD.ANN_ITEM FROM ICOYBDHD_ICT HD inner join ICOYBDPG_ICT PG on HD.HOUSE_CODE = PG.HOUSE_CODE and HD.BID_NO = PG.BID_NO and HD.BID_COUNT = PG.BID_COUNT WHERE HD.HOUSE_CODE = ${HOUSE_CODE} AND HD.BID_NO = ${BID_NO} AND HD.BID_COUNT = ${BID_COUNT} AND HD.HOUSE_CODE = PG.HOUSE_CODE AND HD.BID_NO = PG.BID_NO AND HD.BID_COUNT = PG.BID_COUNT AND HD.STATUS IN ('C', 'R') AND PG.STATUS IN ('C', 'R') AND PG.VOTE_COUNT = $S{VOTE_COUNT } UNION ALL SELECT HNDG.CHANGE_USER_NAME_LOC ,HNDG.ANN_NO ,HNDG.ANN_ITEM FROM ICOYHNDG_ICT HNDG WHERE HNDG.HOUSE_CODE = ${HOUSE_CODE} AND HNDG.BID_NO = ${BID_NO} AND HNDG.BID_COUNT = ${BID_COUNT}

SELECT VENDOR_NAME_LOC AS VENDOR_NAME ,IRS_NO ,ZIP_CODE||' '||ADDRESS_LOC AS ADDRESS ,PHONE_NO1 AS TEL_NO ,CEO_NAME_LOC ,COMPANY_REG_NO , AT.ATTACH_NO , GETFILEATTCOUNT(AT.ATTACH_NO) ATTACH_CNT FROM ICOMVNGL_ICT VN ,(SELECT HOUSE_CODE, VENDOR_CODE, ATTACH_NO FROM ICOYBDCT2_ICT WHERE HOUSE_CODE = ${HOUSE_CODE } AND BID_NO = ${BID_NO } AND BID_COUNT = ${BID_COUNT } ) AT ,ICOMADDR_ICT AD WHERE 1=1 AND VN.VENDOR_CODE = ${COMPANY_CODE} AND VN.HOUSE_CODE = ${HOUSE_CODE } AND VN.HOUSE_CODE = AT.HOUSE_CODE(+) AND VN.VENDOR_CODE = AT.VENDOR_CODE(+) AND VN.HOUSE_CODE = AD.HOUSE_CODE AND VN.VENDOR_CODE = AD.CODE_NO AND AD.CODE_TYPE = '2' AND NVL(VN.DEL_FLAG,'N') = 'N'

SELECT DECODE(COUNT(VO.VENDOR_CODE), 0, 'N', 'Y') AS CNT FROM ICOYBDHD_ICT HD , ICOYBDPG_ICT PG , ICOYBDVO_ICT VO WHERE HD.HOUSE_CODE = ${HOUSE_CODE} AND HD.BID_NO = ${BID_NO} AND HD.BID_COUNT = ${BID_COUNT} AND PG.HOUSE_CODE = HD.HOUSE_CODE AND PG.BID_NO = HD.BID_NO AND PG.BID_COUNT = HD.BID_COUNT AND PG.VOTE_COUNT = TO_NUMBER( ${VOTE_COUNT} ) - 1 -- 바로 이전 차수 AND VO.HOUSE_CODE = PG.HOUSE_CODE AND VO.BID_NO = PG.BID_NO AND VO.BID_COUNT = PG.BID_COUNT AND VO.VOTE_COUNT = PG.VOTE_COUNT AND VO.BID_CANCEL = 'N' AND VO.VENDOR_CODE = ${COMPANY_CODE} AND HD.STATUS IN ('C', 'R')
